messages.title: Resident's Consultation 2010
messages.content: Survey as an important way for me to keep in touch and up to date with residents in Exeter, and so I hope you will be able to help me out by taking a little time to answer these questions and send this survey back in the enclosed prepaid envelope.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ben Bradshaw emphasizes existing government economic policies such as the Car Scrappage Scheme and infrastructure investment, including the electrification of the Great Western Railway.

quotes.text: Lots of people in Exeter contact me with complaints about the bus service. I'd like to hear your views on buses in Exeter.'

leaflet.additionalNotes: Ben Bradshaw newsletters etc. and Labour Party literature are delivered by voluntary Labour Party supporters. Would you be willing to deliver for us in your area?
